BBEX3.A.TJS.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Tajikistan / EUR 1 = TJS ... (middle)
General: With effect from 30 October 2000, a currency conversion took place at the rate of TJR 1,000 = TJS 1.
Source: National Bank of Tajikistan, Dushanbe

Methodology: In 2000, calculated on the basis of month-end rates; the exchange rates calculated between January and September 2000 were included in the calculation at the rate of TJR 1,000 = TJS 1. Since 2001, calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.

Comment on 2000: With effect from 30 October 2000, a currency conversion took place at the rate of TJR 1,000 = TJS 1. The exchange rates calculated between January and September 2000 were included in the calculation at this rate.
